room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Had a great time trying the Dig room. Was a fun yet challenging room and we barely won. Great setup and great staff. Big shout out to Josh and James.

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Did this for a birthday party. It was really hard but very cool. Advice is divide and conquer. We did dig. Very cool effects. Very challenging and fun. Read the signs on the walls!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Lots of fun! Was invited to attend with friends for their son's birthday. We did the Dig room and completed it! Would recommend going with people you know and work well together with.

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We took our team there and had an absolute blast! One of the best team building events we have done in quite some time. I would definitely recommend it to someone who is trying to see where you are at in regards to team cohesion.

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Super fun, super challenging, had to use every clue to escape with 2 minutes left... but we escaped! Would definitely recommend this room if you have a big group
